participant_1.background:
I love to feel the warm sun on my skin and the salty sea air in my hair.
My family is full of witty people and we love cats.
I've finally settled down in the country with my dog and started a new job.
I try to start my mornings with a fresh cup of coffee and a healthy breakfast.
i just graduated college with my bachelor s degree in education.

participant_2.background:
I'm curious about the history of the lake near my house.
I love going on YouTube to watch video tutorials for my online classes and to find new recipes to cook for my family.
i work in a circus as a juggler.
I wake up early and listen to Ween to get my creative juices flowing.
I want to conquer my anxiety so I can live my life to the fullest.

content.text: Morning! My day is going great so far, just got done with a long juggle practice. What about you?
It's going pretty well! I'm just getting ready for a day of teaching. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to YouTube to watch video tutorials for my online classes and to find new recipes to cook for my family. I also enjoy juggling and listening to Ween to get my creative juices flowing.
Those all sound like great hobbies! I'm trying to get back into reading more, and I've been really enjoying watching documentaries. What kind of music do you like?
I love all kinds of music, but I'm really into funk and R&B right now. My favorite band is probably Parliament-Funkadelic.
Oh, I've heard of them! They're really good. I've been listening to a lot of classic rock lately, like Pink Floyd and Led Zeppelin.
I love Pink Floyd! They're one of my favorite bands. I've never really gotten into Led Zeppelin, but I've heard good things about them.
They're definitely worth checking out. What's your favorite thing about being a juggler?
I love the feeling of accomplishment when I can finally master a new trick. It's also a great way to relieve stress and clear my mind.
That's awesome! I can imagine it would be really satisfying to learn new tricks. I'm always looking for new ways to relieve stress
